name: mndoisexid

stmt.origin: eleq2s(c0, cmndo, cin(csem, cexid), wcel(c0, cexid))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cmndo), wcel(c0, cexid))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cin(csem, cexid)), wcel(c0, cexid))
-| wceq(cmndo, cin(csem, cexid))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ MndOp → c0 ∈ ExId)
⊣ (c0 ∈(SemiGrp ⋂ ExId)→ c0 ∈ ExId)
⊣ MndOp =(SemiGrp ⋂ ExId)

-| wi(wcel(c0, cin(csem, cexid)), wcel(c0, cexid))
-| wceq(cmndo, cin(csem, cexid))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ MndOp → c0 ∈ ExId)
⊣ (c0 ∈(SemiGrp ⋂ ExId)→ c0 ∈ ExId)
⊣ MndOp =(SemiGrp ⋂ ExId)
